com.arangodb

Interface ArangoSerializationAccessor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArangoCollection, ArangoCollectionAsync, ArangoDatabase, ArangoDatabaseAsync, ArangoDB, ArangoDBAsync, ArangoEdgeCollection, ArangoEdgeCollectionAsync, ArangoGraph, ArangoGraphAsync, ArangoRoute, ArangoRouteAsync, ArangoSearch, ArangoSearchAsync, ArangoVertexCollection, ArangoVertexCollectionAsync, ArangoView, ArangoViewAsync
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArangoCollectionAsyncImpl, ArangoDatabaseAsyncImpl, ArangoDBAsyncImpl, ArangoEdgeCollectionAsyncImpl, ArangoGraphAsyncImpl, ArangoRouteAsyncImpl, ArangoSearchAsyncImpl, ArangoVertexCollectionAsyncImpl, ArangoViewAsyncImpl

    public interface ArangoSerializationAccessor
    Author:
    Mark Vollmary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArangoSerialization util()
      Returns driver internal serialization API for serializing and deserializing Java POJOs to/from VPackSlice
      ArangoSerialization util(ArangoSerializationFactory.Serializer serializer)
      Returns serialization API for serializing and deserializing Java POJOs to/from VPackSlice by the given type
